archimedes: event RoleAdminChanged(bytes32 indexed role, bytes32 indexed previousAdminRole, bytes32 indexed newAdminRole)
event RoleGranted(bytes32 indexed role, address indexed account, address indexed sender)
event RoleRevoked(bytes32 indexed role, address indexed account, address indexed sender)

events.flashLoan: event FlashLoan(address indexed target, address indexed initiator, address indexed asset, uint256 amount, uint256 premium, uint16 referralCode)
